channel.title: Nomoremouse PK'ing Client
channel.description:
[B][SIZE=36pt][url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ztlEmFgcxSU]Video Demonstration[/url][/SIZE][/B]
[b]Features:[/b]
[ul][li]Auto screenshot on kill[/li] [li]Auth system[/li] [li]Auto special attack[/li] [li]Freeze timer[/li] [li]Toggleable macros[/li] [li]Customizable hotkeys[/li][/ul]
[b]Future Updates:[/b]
[ul][li]Writeable macros[/li] [li]Auto eating/prayer[/li] [li]Auto special attack[/li] [li]Prayer and special attack on screen[/li][/ul]
I'm all ears for suggestions and criticism!
[CENTER][IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/2e3o9qp.png[/img][/CENTER]
